name: That Rocket Game
description:
Welcome Rocket Scientist!

It's time to construct the ultimate craft to fulfill you space fantasies while cleaning up the junk debis in the atmosphere.

Reach as high as you can, the higher you go the more valuable the debis which you can sort into grinders for credit used to upgrade your rocket!



WATCH OUT FOR ASTEROIDS!!!!

Find rare collectables on your trips into outer space and display them on your fancy collectables shelf.
